release_notes.en-US:
Introduced three additional preferences:
extensions.thunderHTMLedit.FontFamily
extensions.thunderHTMLedit.FontSize
extensions.thunderHTMLedit.DarkTheme
Setting DarkTheme to true will select a dark theme.

- The add-on is now restartless
- General overhaul and clean-up, streamlined initialisation
- HTML editor updated to Ace 1.4.5
- No longer replacing NBSP character with   - Ace makes NBSP visible anyway
